description: Replacement of existing rear extension, internal and external alterations, and other associated works
decision_conditions:
Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted must be begun not later than the end of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: In order to comply with the provisions of Section 91 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).
Condition : 2 - The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans: ELY-DMB-XX-XX-DR-A-0110 PL02, ELY-DMB-XX-XX-DR-A-0111 PL02, ELY-DMB-XX-XX-DR-A-0112 PL02, ELY-DMB-XX-XX-DR-A-0113 PL01, ELY-DMB-XX-XX-DR-A-0114 PL02, ELY-DMB-XX-XX-DR-A-0115 PL02, ELY-DMB-XX-XX-DR-A-0116 PL01, ELY-DMB-XX-XX-DR-A-0210 PL04, ELY-DMB-XX-XX-DR-A-0211 PL04, ELY-DMB-XX-XX-DR-A-0212 PL07, ELY-DMB-XX-XX-DR-A-0213 PL03, ELY-DMB-XX-XX-DR-A-0214 PL04, ELY-DMB-XX-XX-DR-A-0215 PL04, ELY-DMB-XX-XX-DR-A-0216 PL03, ELY-DMB-XX-XX-DR-A-0220 PL03, ELY-DMB-XX-XX-DR-A-0221 PL03, ELY-DMB-XX-XX-DR-A-0222 PL03, ELY-DMB-XX-XX-DR-A-0310 PL05, ELY-DMB-XX-XX-DR-A-0311 PL06, ELY-DMB-XX-XX-DR-A-0312 PL6, ELY-DMB-XX-XX-DR-A-0313 PL04, ELY-DMB-XX-XX-DR-A-0314 PL05, ELY-DMB-XX-XX-DR-A-0315 PL04, ELY-DMB-XX-XX-DR-A-0316 PL04, ELY-DMB-XX-XX-DR-A-3501 PL02, ELY-DMB-XX-XX-DR-A-3502 PL02, ELY-DMB-XX-XX-DR-A-3503 PL02, ELY-DMB-XX-XX-DR-A-4301 PL03, 

Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning.
Condition : 3 - All new external work shall be carried out in materials that resemble, as closely as possible, in colour and texture those of the existing building, unless otherwise specified in the approved application. 

Reason: To safeguard the appearance of the premises and the character of the immediate area in accordance with the requirements of Policies D1 and D2 of the London Borough of Camden Local Plan 2017. 
Condition : 4 - Before the relevant part of the work is begun, detailed drawings, or samples of materials as appropriate, in respect of the following, shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the local planning authority: 

 Plan, elevation and section drawings of the proposed glazing screens also showing fixings and junctions with cornices and skirting boards. 

The relevant part of the works shall be carried out in accordance with the details thus approved.

Reason:  To safeguard the appearance of the premises and the character of the immediate area in accordance with the requirements of Policies D1 and D2 of the London Borough of Camden Local Plan 2017.
Condition : 5 - The unauthorised recessed lighting located throughout the property shall be removed and ceilings reinstated to their original condition. Failure to do so will result in enforcement action.

Reason: To safeguard the appearance and character of the premises in accordance with the requirements of Policy D2 of the London Borough of Camden Local Plan 2017.
